title: Bug 120216: Group dialog not displayed when dataset is not set
OB: When a table report item is added without setting the dataset and the user tries to create a new table group, the group dialog is not displayed.
EB: The group dialog should be displayed even if the dataset is not set. The user should be able to define a group, regardless of whether the dataset is defined or not.
SR:
1. Create a new report
2. Add a table report item without setting the dataset
3. Try to create a new table group
4. Verify that the group dialog is displayed
